page.title: 17Childrens' Pastimes.
page.content:
The clubs in Hartwell are the Boys' Brigade,Girls'Brigade,Youth Club,Scouts Guides,Brownies and Cubs.You have a uniform for the Brigades.Its meetings are held at the Methodist Chapel.Those boys who want to play cricket,rugby or football have to go to Ashton or Hackl- ton.For youngsters of 5-9 yrs there is a gymnastics club at the Parish Hall on Saturday's at 9.30 a.m. run by Mrs Smith.In our spare time we play games on home computers,do stunts on BMXs' & practice Â£Break-dancing'.The Playing Field Association is trying to build a new pavilion and community centre.Some of us go angling at Bozenham Mill,River Tove.You have to belong to Leighton Buzzard Angling Club or get a licence for your rod from Anglia Water Board.
Nicholas Sansome,11 & David Alcock,11.
